page.title: 13R.H.& D. Railway Engines
page.content:
There are eleven steam locomotives and one diesel, all built specially for the line with names like{Doctor {Syn, Black Prince and Green Goddess. There are over sixty carriages including a bar car and open side coaches for the warmer weather.
There is a regular service running between April and September from Hythe to Dungeness stopping at Dymchurch, St. Mary's Bay, New Romney and Romney Sands. There are refreshment rooms at Hythe, Dungeness and New Romney and also a model Exhibition at New Romney, the lines headquarters.
